description: The key point to this set is Point of Origin. Unless stated, however, the other hand will chamber when the other is in action.

steps: Execute a right thrust punch to face level. Execute a right vertical back knuckle to face level.
Execute a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a left vertical back knuckle to face level.
Execute a right thrust punch to face level. Execute a right inverted hammerfist to the groin level.
Execute a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a left inverted hammerfist to the groin level.
Execute a right thrust punch to face level. Execute a right backfist to the temple.
Execute a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a left backfist to the temple.
Execute a right thrust punch to face level. Execute a right inward hammerfist to the ribs.
Execute a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a left inward hammerfist to the ribs.
Execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level. Execute a right vertical back knuckle strike to face level.
Execute a left vertical thrust punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Execute a left vertical back knuckle strike to face level.
Execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level. Execute a right inverted hammerfist to the groin.
Execute a left vertical thrust punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Execute a left inverted hammerfist to the groin.
Execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level. Execute a right backfist to the temple.
Execute a left vertical thrust punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Execute a left backfist to the temple.
Execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level. Execute a right inward hammerfist to the ribs.
Execute a left vertical thrust punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Execute a left inward hammerfist to the ribs.
Execute a right and a left thrust punch to 12 o'clock to face level. Simultaneously execute a right and a left back knuckle strike to face level.
Execute a right and a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a right and a left inverted hammerfist to groin level.
Execute a right and a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a right and a left backfist to the temple.
Execute a right and a left thrust punch to face level. Execute a right and a left inward hammerfist to the ribs.

Simultaneously execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level as you execute a left vertical punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Simultaneously execute a right back knuckle strike to face level as you execute a left back knuckle strike to face level.

Simultaneously execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level as you execute a left vertical punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Simultaneously execute a right inverted hammerfist to the groin as you execute a left inverted hammerfist to the groin.

Simultaneously execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level as you execute a left vertical punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Simultaneously execute a right backfist to the temple as you execute a left backfist to the temple.

Simultaneously execute a right vertical thrust punch to 3 o'clock to face level as you execute a left vertical punch to 9 o'clock to face level. Simultaneously execute a right inward hammerfist to the ribs as you execute a left inward hammerfist to the ribs.
Slide your left foot to your right into an attention stance with both of your knees slightly bent.
Execute a right and a left thrust punch to face level.
Execute a right and a left back knuckle to face level.
Execute a right and a left inverted hammerfist to the groin.
Execute a right and a left backfist to the temple.
Execute a right and a left inward hammerfist to the ribs.
